rows.label: tlk45370152_01_msg0001
rows.name:
With the tensions with Invidia
riding high for so long, our
military expenses just keep going up.

rows.label: tlk45370152_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Sooner or later, the funds we earn
from Gula and the surrounding minor
nations won't be enough to cover them.

rows.label: tlk45370152_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If we don't do something about all this
soon, our national coffers will be wrung
dry and our people will starve!

rows.label: tlk45370152_01_msg0004
rows.name:
As a member of the Imperial Senate, it
is my duty to do something about the
situation. But what should I propose...?
